mapper.select: SELECT u.`userID`,u.`userName`,u.`userImgPath`,u.`shopImg`,u.`selfIntroduction`,u.`merchantLevel` FROM `user` AS u WHERE (u.`firstServiceID` = #{stid} OR `secondServiceID` = #{stid}) AND u.`auditStatus` = 2 ORDER BY `merchantLevel` DESC,`orderCount` DESC LIMIT 9

SELECT p.`postID`,p.`title`,u.`userID`,u.`userName`,u.`userImgPath`,f.`fmName`,IF(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR,p.`releaseTime`,NOW())>=24,CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,p.`releaseTime`,NOW()),'天'), CONCAT(CONCAT(FLOOR(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,p.`releaseTime`,NOW())/60),'小时'),CONCAT(FLOOR(SUBSTRING_INDEX(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,p.`releaseTime`,NOW())/60,'.',-1)/10000*60),'分钟'))) AS 'releaseTime', (SELECT u.`userID` FROM `postcomment` AS pc INNER JOIN `user` AS u ON u.`userID` = pc.`commentator` WHERE `postID` = p.`postID` AND pid = 0 AND `operatingState` = 1 ORDER BY `reviewTime` DESC LIMIT 1) AS `replyUserID`, (SELECT u.`userName` FROM `postcomment` AS pc INNER JOIN `user` AS u ON u.`userID` = pc.`commentator` WHERE `postID` = p.`postID` AND pid = 0 AND `operatingState` = 1 ORDER BY `reviewTime` DESC LIMIT 1) AS `replyUserName`, (SELECT IF(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR,pc.`reviewTime`,NOW())>=24,CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,pc.`reviewTime`,NOW()),'天'), CONCAT(CONCAT(FLOOR(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,pc.`reviewTime`,NOW())/60),'小时'),CONCAT(FLOOR(SUBSTRING_INDEX(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,pc.`reviewTime`,NOW())/60,'.',-1)/10000*60),'分钟'))) FROM `postcomment` AS pc INNER JOIN `user` AS u ON u.`userID` = pc.`commentator` WHERE `postID` = p.`postID` AND pid = 0 AND `operatingState` = 1 ORDER BY `reviewTime` DESC LIMIT 1) AS `replyUserTime` FROM `post` AS p INNER JOIN `user` AS u ON u.`userID` = p.`userID` INNER JOIN `forummanagement` AS f ON f.`fmID` = p.`fmID` ORDER BY p.`releaseTime` DESC LIMIT 9
SELECT * FROM `post` WHERE `fmID` = 29 ORDER BY `releaseTime` DESC LIMIT 9
